menu

Class PluginFinderObservable

  • java.lang.Object
    • menu.Observable
      • menu.PluginFinderObservable

  • public class PluginFinderObservable
extends Observable
    PluginFinderObservable is a class which finds all plugins in a directory and add it to the droppins directory It will be used by an extendable editor.
    Author:
    Coilliaux Thibault, Deleplanque Dylan, Landschoot Ludovic, Saab Mathieu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PluginFinderObservable(java.lang.String path)
      Constructor for a plugin finder We create a timer which will, each seconds, check if there were any changes in the plugin directory

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      A method which will generate plugins from the list of files we have intanciated sooner
      void init()
      A method which will initialize the timer and the observers
      void update()
      A method which will regenerate the plugins list and call the update of the observers.

      A method which will update the observers Here, it will update the plugins list of the frame
